name: Wheel Balls
description:
Wheel Balls is idle and clicker game. You can play everywhere ,every time. It is a boring killer game.

HOW TO PLAY:
1 - Tap holes or let balls drop into holes
2 - Buy other balls and drop balls to get more score
3 - Update balls to make them stronger
4 - Buy more and more balls
5 - Use Boost TAP x10 to increase damage for tap
6 - Use Boost SPEED x2 to double game speed
7 - Use Boost GOLD x2 to double revenue
8 - Use TIME JUMP inflate revenue

Collect all balls and become the best player in Wheel Balls.

If you love the game. Give us your feedback: https://www.facebook.com/tutappgames

Enjoy your time.
